item.description:
Saturday, August 16, 2008 from 4-8 p.m.

Come down and sample beer from some of the finest Craft Brewers around including Sherwood Forest , Magic Hat, Sierra Nevada, Hook and Ladder, Woodchuck Cider, Narragansett and more!

Live music and great food samples from area restaurants.

Tickets $20 in advance, $25 at the door. Also $10 designated driver tickets per web page.

Go to website for advance tickets. **** This means 2 weeks ahead of date, so be warned. Also may be a service charge****

2008 Summer Brewfest
Saturday, August 16, 2008 at 4:00 PM
Indian Ranch
200 Gore Road
Webster, MA 01570
Phone: (508) 943-3871
Website: www.indianranch.com
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of ticket house 3:45 to 4 PM.
item.name: Summer Brewfest - Indian Ranch
